[h1][b][u]Half-Life: Source[/u][/b][/h1]

[b]tl;dr =[/b] Just buy this game already.

[b]Points:[/b] ‚ûä ‚ûã ‚ûå ‚ûç ‚ûé ‚ûè ‚ûê ‚ûë ‚ûí ‚ûì    [i](10 out of 10)[/i]
[b]Rating:[/b] [u]Perfect.[/u]
[b]Verdict:[/b] [u]Must have.[/u]
[b]Seal of approval:[/b] [u]Yes.[/u]

[b]Story:[/b] This is how it all started...now made in Source.

[b]Gameplay:[/b] Simple FPS-mechanics, Platforming and Puzzles.

[b]Difficulty:[/b] Challenging at times but not impossible.

[b]Features:[/b] Crowbars, Headcrabs and greek letters.

[b]Duration:[/b] Depending on your playstyle, up to 10 hours. At the time of this review I played it for 9 hours.

[b]Improvements:[/b] Nothing.

[i]This review was written by me. I purchased the game myself and did not recieve a review copy. I did not get payed to review this game.[/i]

- MacTehn

There's a channel on YouTube called noclip, they recently uploaded an excellent documentary about half-life which is well worth watching, this got me in the mood to play the game again so I installed it on my x220 thinkpad, it plays great but got me wondering why it wasn't out for phones yet so I googled it and low and behold it is playable on android via the wonderful app called Xash3D FWGS found in the playstore, I followed the easy  instructions and now play half-life on my galaxy S9+ deluxe pro, it looks and plays better on my phone than my i7 laptop, still need the laptop to transfer the game and mods but it's so satisfying to be able to play this classic game on the go, at work, in bed, on the toilet, on the wife, in the bath, in a field, on top of a mountain, wherever I am I can whip out the phone and play half-life.
its nice port to the original but the port breaks alot of stuff the origanal half life had like texures in rooms randomizing and the thirdperson feature besides that it nice

Esto no es una critica ni un an√°lisis del juego, quiero expresar lo que sent√≠ al jugarlo y tratar de plasmar en las personas que deseen comprarlo o aun no lo juegan, las ganas de disfrutar de este titulo.
Soy muy consiente de los a√±os que tiene este juego, Half life es una de esas obras de culto para las que llegu√© tarde. Todo el mundo habla sobre este juego, hay un meme muy famoso referente al n√∫mero 3 y la desarrolladora de Half life que da vueltas por todo internet y es casi imposible no conocerlo. me anime a jugarlo por primera vez el d√≠a 25 de diciembre del 2018 por que al fin pude comprarlo en una rebaja de navidad, junto a todas sus expansiones y su tan aclamada secuela.
Entrar en Black Mesa por primera vez fue un poco extra√±o, sabia que este juego era un fps, algo que es conocimiento com√∫n, pero no conoc√≠a nada de su trama, as√≠ que al encontrarme que todo se desarrollaba en un laboratorio cient√≠fico pens√© inmediatamente en una historia gen√©rica y clich√© de t√≠tulos fps de los a√±os 90 - Principios del 2000, como me equivoque.
Puedo asegurar ahora, que este juego posee quiz√°, los mejores primeros 30 minutos de un video-juego, sin menospreciar el trabajo de otros, como por ejemplo Bioshock. Pero quede impresionado como me atraparon en tan solo un par de docenas de minutos en su mundo. Quiero comparar una experiencia similar que me paso con el juego Mass Effect 1, tambi√©n pensaba que era otro juego mas del monton, pero en la primera mision senti que ya me ten√≠an agarrado de los pies y no me soltar√≠an.
El juego es simplemente perfecto dentro de lo que puede serlo, si dejas de lado los problemas t√©cnicos y limitaciones de la √©poca y te plantas a disfrutarlo por lo que fue en su tiempo, lo disfrutaras como nunca has disfrutado otro juego. Scripts deliciosos que te narran la trama, escenarios coherentes incluso conectados entre si que le dan aun mas realismo, una historia fragmentada en miles de detalles, debes mirar situaciones, escuchar conversaciones mientras pasas, detenerte a observar partes de las instalaciones para entender algunas cosas. A los que son seguidores de la saga Souls esto les sonara un mont√≥n.
Half life es una obra maestra dentro de su genero y grosso modo una obra maestra dentro del mundo de los video juegos en general. Vanguardista, inteligente, detallista, desafiante y por sobre todo, divertido.
Recomendado al 100 %, no le colocare una nota por que como dije al principio, solo estoy relatando lo que me hizo sentir, pru√©benlo y si les gusta al menos el 10% de lo que me gusto a mi, valdr√° totalmente la pena.

Half-Life: Source is a port of Half-Life to the more modern Source engine from the original Gold Source engine. Doesn't really add anything special besides counting as a 'remaster' and adds a few small cosmetic changes. Lots of scripted parts of the game and entities are broken so expect having to either reload the level or area often or just completely using cheats to skip them.

I have played a decent amount of both versions on Half-Life by Valve. Half-Life: Source is the worse version of the two.

"Half-Life: Source is a digitally remastered version" is probably the most bogus statement from valve. There are graphical glitches, bugs, it even crashed on me a couple times for no reason at all. The HD water and the use of Half-Life 2 barrels feel really out of place for this game.

While yes, Half-Life itself is a fantastic game (and I recommend anyone who hasn't played it yet PLAY IT), Please do not get this version. Get the original GoldSrc version.

Une version remasteris√©e? Non. Plut√¥t un portage pour que les graphismes soient compatibles avec la plupart des d√©finitions d'√©crans d'aujourd'hui. Ca apporte un petit plus, certes, mais autant jouer √† Black mesa, qui lui est v√©ritablement remasteris√©.
Le souci, c'est que le jeu est bugg√©. Plus que quand on met le CD original. Des freezes intempestifs et micro saccades viennent g√¢cher le tout (√ßa vous fera mal m√™me √©quip√© d'une GTX 1080Ti ou RTX 2080), resets bizarres dans les niveaux, voix des PNJ d√©synchronis√©es, scripts bugg√©s ( attendre un personnage qui reste plant√© comme un c√®pe alors qu'on a lanc√© le script pour qu'il nous suive par exemple). 
Dans les nouvelles g√©n√©rations, je ne sais pas qui voudra y jouer vu l'anciennet√© et la qualit√© des graphismes. Ce serait pourtant √† eux que je conseillerai le jeu (le sc√©nario est bon, mais entach√© par des scripts mauvais). 
Les anciens joueurs... Tout d√©pendra si vous ne voulez pas vous emb√™ter avec le mode de compatibilit√© windows et les vieilles d√©finitions...
Un pouce en bas pour le principe: il faut laisser les vieilles l√©gendes reposer en paix si elles ne b√©n√©ficient pas d'un boulot √† la hauteur. 
Apr√®s, pour m√™me pas 2 euros...
It's not worth porting on Source though, you can try Black Mesa

Half-Life is fun. This review is for the game as a port.

     As an engine port, it has it's ups and downs. Weapons have redone textures, bullets are more easily nowing where they go, and ragdolls exist. But even the game mechanics are different from the Goldsource edition, such as guns and enemies.
     The guns' metal texture now shines on movement, a staple with the Source engine. And the HD weapons were also replace with high-quality models and textures. But the looks may be a downside, as the some of the HD weapons don't have reload sounds. And some weapon mechanics are completely different. The SMG's recoil is as if you are baubbling your head instead of being taken back by firing a gun. And the grenades don't fly across the room like you'd expect they'd do in the source engine.
     For the port, the difficulty no longer changes the amount of damage you give and take, it changes how much of a bullet sponge enemies are. And the maps have explosives and more enemies to show how Source can make the whole mutliple aliens scenario work better in your favor. NPCs are improved in this, as followers no longer walk around in a grind like fashion, the Tentacle (the three alien claws) react to sound faster, and headcrabs don't slide around as much. But vortigaunts and securities won't shoot at breakable windows like they used to.

---UPDATE---
     Okay after finishing the game, this is basically harder than play Half Life 1 on hard difficulty. Ever since I entered Xen, difficulty has been cranked to the max. Enemies are difficult, and the lower gravity does NOT work on the Source engine, any slope you walk up on sends you flying fifty meters high. And the fight with Nihilanth is longer than before, making you teleport more than originally.

---New UPDATE---
     The helicopter is broken. Nearly impossible to hit.

     So the port is somewhat of a game changer in certain aspects. But atleast the flashlight is better.

(G√∂zle g√∂r√ºl√ºr tek fark sanƒ±rƒ±m su efekti. Onun haricinde √∂yle aman aman geli≈üme yok.) Buna raƒümen orijinal oyunda olmayan onlarca bug hata vs bu oyunun i√ßinde var. Kaplamalarda olu≈üan sorunlardan tutun √ße≈üitli hareket mekaniklerinde olu≈üan buglara kadar bir√ßok bug var. Orijinal oyunda olmamasƒ±na raƒümen yenilenmi≈ü versiyonda bu kadar √ßok bug olmasƒ± cidden can sƒ±kƒ±cƒ±. Half-Life'dan az daha para kazanƒ±yƒ±m kafasƒ±yla Valve'nin b√∂yle bir≈üey yapmasƒ±nƒ± anlƒ±yorum. Ama insan azcƒ±k √∂zen g√∂sterir yani bu nedir? Ufak tefek g√∂rsel geli≈ütirmeler i√ßin bir√ßok sorun eklenmi≈ü oyuna. Kesinlikle √∂nermiyorum. Gidin orijinal oyunu alƒ±n kafanƒ±z rahat etsin.

Okay so this is going to sound weird but hear me out on this one...
So at one point in the game your crawling through a pipe and you start to hear some music, now the sound track on this one here is pretty boppin' if I do say so my self, so you think to your self okay play them jammy jams GabeN, Im down. But then you hear it. it not just another song its the fucking music that plays over the valve logo. Now you see i didnt know that there was more then 5 secs of music in that song I always thought it was a quick splash of music. No man thats an entire song and hearing the whole thing after all of these years of just hearing the opening is something that I cant describe, Im trying but you need to hear that shit. Also you fight a helicopter after you get out of that pipe and the music is playing and your like "I HAVE A CROWBAR FUCK YOU" then the helicopter is all like "FUCK YOU I FLY" then the cliff that your on is like "Ha HA... I have the power of gravity on my side" and your all like "AHH FUCK" and the helicopter is all "DAMMN Cliff" then they all kiss
12/10 I cry every time

Igual de bueno pero con mejores gr√°ficos

Durante el incidente la sala de pruebas donde estaba Freeman queda destruida pero √©l consigue escapar de all√≠ gracias al traje de protecci√≥n. Tras volver a su dimensi√≥n, despu√©s de haber sido atrapado en varios portales, tendr√° que hacer frente a las consecuencias del experimento ya que los extraterrestres han invadido la base cientif√≠ca destruyendo todo a su paso. Gordon tendr√° que sobrevivir, defenderse de los ataques extraterrestres y conseguir llegar a la superficie. Durante el trayecto hacia la superficie hay soldados a los que tendr√° que enfrentarse.

El videojuego es de 1998 y tanto la jugabilidad, gr√°ficos, personajes son una joya ,es bastante entretenido y hace que el videojuego acabe lleg√°ndote a encantar. En esta remasterizaci√≥n encontramos muchos cambios ya que todo parece m√°s realista . Todas estas cosas hacen que el videojuego se disfrute much√≠simo aunque siempre nos quedar√° en el coraz√≥n esa primera versi√≥n ya que es entra√±able. Sin duda es un juego que recomiendo al 100% porque Valve sabe lo que se hace y este juego lo vale mucho.

I just cannot give this game a positive score and it mainly because it does not bring anything special compared to the original release. Yes, the game is based on the Source engine and some textures such as water surfaces have been improved and now look much more realistic, but HL 1 is not about realistic graphics and physics but about the nostalgic feel, which was in my opinion removed by this update. Besides of the above mentioned, the game is quite glitchy, so you have to be ready to do a lot of quick saves, otherwise it may happen that in certain point the game just decides that you cannot continue and have to start from the beginning (or the last functional save). In a nutshell, if you want to play HF 1, just buy the original version of the game.

Rating: 4/10
